text.origin: Lucas: ¡Hola! ¿Quieres un café?
text.translation: Лукас: Привет! Ты хочешь кофе?

text.origin: Sofía: No, gracias. Estoy un poco cansada.
text.translation: София: Нет, спасибо. Я немного устала.

text.origin: Lucas: ¿Cansada? ¿Por qué?
text.translation: Лукас: Устала? Почему?

text.origin: Sofía: Estudié toda la noche para el examen.
text.translation: София: Я училась всю ночь для экзамена.

text.origin: Lucas: ¡Vaya! Eso es duro. ¿De qué es el examen?
text.translation: Лукас: Ух ты! Это тяжело. По какому предмету экзамен?

text.origin: Sofía: Es de matemáticas, muy difícil.
text.translation: София: По математике, очень сложно.

text.origin: Lucas: Me gustan las matemáticas.
text.translation: Лукас: Мне нравятся математика.

text.origin: Sofía: Sí, claro. A algunos les gusta, a otros no.
text.translation: София: Да, конечно. Некоторые любят, другие нет.

text.origin: Lucas: Tal vez puedo ayudarte a estudiar.
text.translation: Лукас: Возможно, я могу помочь тебе учиться.

text.origin: Sofía: ¿De verdad? Eso sería genial.
text.translation: София: Правда? Это было бы здорово.

text.origin: Lucas: Sí, me encanta ayudar a mis amigos.
text.translation: Лукас: Да, я люблю помогать своим друзьям.

text.origin: Sofía: Pero, ¿te gustan las matemáticas o me gustas tú?
text.translation: София: Но, тебе нравятся математика или нравлюсь я?

text.origin: Lucas: ¡Ambas! Las matemáticas y tú.
text.translation: Лукас: И то, и другое! Математика и ты.

text.origin: Sofía: ¡Qué bonito! Me haces sonreír.
text.translation: София: Как мило! Ты заставляешь меня улыбаться.

text.origin: Lucas: Gracias. Eres muy amable.
text.translation: Лукас: Спасибо. Ты очень добрая.

text.origin: Sofía: Pero, ¿qué café tomas tú?
text.translation: София: Но, какой кофе ты пьешь?

text.origin: Lucas: Me gusta el café negro, sin azúcar.
text.translation: Лукас: Мне нравится черный кофе, без сахара.

text.origin: Sofía: Yo prefiero el café con leche.
text.translation: София: Я предпочитаю кофе с молоком.

text.origin: Lucas: Tal vez deberíamos pedir uno juntos.
text.translation: Лукас: Возможно, нам стоит заказать один вместе.

text.origin: Sofía: Buena idea, ¡hagámoslo!
text.translation: София: Хорошая идея, давай сделаем это!

prompt: You should provide dialog in Spanish level A2, with translation into Russian. Place of dialog: cafeteria Context of dialog: Romantic, confusion, first date. Comic situation. Characters: First: Role: customer Mood: excited Sex: masculino Description: nerd Second: Role: customer Mood: bored Sex: femenino Description: student If some of dialog parameters are missed generate random values for them based on known parameters. Generate names for characters. Dialog should correspond following requirements: - each speach should be 1-3 sentences (use followgin form: [Character Name]: [Character turn]); - dialog should be split in paragraphs: for each speech add its own paragraph, e.g.: Alex: Hello! --- Bob: Hi! How do you do? - include at least 15-20 speach per character; - use numbers in words in Spanish; - sentences and paragraphs SHOULD NOT be empty. Check that the dialog includes at least 15 sentences. Check that each paragraph includes only one speech. Make a list of 20-25 words used in the dialog with translation into Russian according to the following requirements: - 5-7 verbs, 5-7 adjectives, 5-7 substantives, 5-7 adverbs; - choose the most hard words; - verbs should be in INFINITIVE form, adjectives in SINGLE MASCULINE form, and substantives in SINGLE form; - check that words are in the right forms described in the previous requirement; - check that the amount of words is at least 20; - the list should be SORTED alphabetically. Generate title in Spanish with translation into Russian for generated dialog, use style as in popular magazines. Check that title is in Spanish. Based on information in dialog add 5 questions about it to check how the student understood the dialog. Information in the dialog SHOULD BE sufficient to answer all questions correctly. Each question should have 4 variants of answers, 1-2 of them should have more than one correct answer. Check that correct options for answers are really correct. Add 3-5 tags to the result. Check that in the generated data there are no words in other languages than Spanish except proper nouns. Extract all proper nouns from the generated dialog. Proper nouns include names of specific people (except names of characters of generated dialog), places (e.g., regions like 'Caribe'), organizations, titles, or other named entities. Return the results as an array without duplicates. Perform an additional check to ensure that: - no words or phrases from languages other than Spanish (except translations into Russian) are included in the dialog, questions, or word lists; - Spanish words are used in correct grammatical forms: times, gender (masculine/femenin), sentences structure, etc.; - proper nouns are used only when culturally appropriate and relevant to the topic.
